entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puntzi Mountain 3:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain and a few flurries changing to periods of snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning near midnight then changing to snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
